alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:54PM CDT until June 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carden Bottoms, or 12 miles south of Russellville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Ola... Oppelo... Adona... Sequoya Park... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... St. Vincent... Mosley... Plumerville... Casa... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
